titlestmt.titleproper: Carroll L.V. Meeks Collection of Ephemera on Various Architects
Carroll L.V. Meeks Collection of Ephemera on Various Architects
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Robert Carlucci New Haven, Connecticut April, 2008

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Monday April 22, 2019 at 23:01

did.unittitle: Carroll L.V. Meeks Collection of Ephemera on Various Architects
did.abstract: Collection of ephemera, including articles, newspaper clippings, brochures, pamphlets, and photographs started by Yale Professor Carroll L.V. Meeks. Upon his death, the collection was given by his daughters to the Yale University Arts Library and maintained in the Visual Resources Collection where department staff added material on occasion.

origination.label: creator
origination.persname: Meeks, Carroll L. V. (Carroll Louis Vanderslice), 1907-1966

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University. Further use of this material may be subject to the copyright laws of the United States (Title 17, United States Code) or to site license or other rights management terms or conditions.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Carroll L.V. Meeks Collection of Ephemera on Various Architects

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection of ephemera, including articles, newspaper clippings, brochures, pamphlets, and photographs started by Yale Professor Carroll L.V. Meeks. Upon his death, the collection was given by his daughters to the Yale University Arts Library and maintained in the Visual Resources Collection where department staff added material on occasion.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: In folders, arranged alphabetically by name of architect or architectural firm.

did.unittitle: Austin, Henry [1804-1891], (3 folders and copy of inventory of Henry Austin papers in Manuscripts & Archives)
